p: Flow cytometric used to identity of late apoptosis according to Mohammad and his group method with some modification (Khan et al., 2012). Briefly, HCAM cells were treated with or without IC 50 values of monoica Forssk extract for 24 h. The cells were harvested, rinsed twice with PBS, and labeled with 5 uL FITC-conjugated annexin V according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. After incubation in dark for 10 min and then labeled with PI, the samples were immediately analyzed on a flow cytometer (Beckman Coulter, Epics XL).
